item.title: Building a K3s Cluster with Armbian on Orange Pi 5 Plus
item.description: In this blog post, I’ll be sharing my practical journey of building a K3s Cluster on the Orange Pi 5 Plus (opi5+) using Armbian as the Operating System (OS). The post is meant as a straightforward guide for anyone looking to replicate the process. I hope it proves helpful for your own setup. Why Armbian? After my failed attempt using Fedora CoreOS, Armbian + K3s was one of the options I considered.
